price: Ka kyerε wͻn a wͻnnye nnie no sε: ”Modeε monyε mo adwuma sεdeε mo amammerε kyerε mo, nokorε sε yεn nso yεreyε adwuma (sεdeε Nyankopͻn ahyε yεn);
arabic: وَقُل لِّلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ ٱعۡمَلُواْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمۡ إِنَّا عَٰمِلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waqul lilladhīna lā yu'minūna iʿ'malū ʿalā makānatikum innā ʿāmilūna
